descriptionSet.description: This advertisement calendar by the Delhi Calendar Mfg. Co. from 1941, has an image of the shrine in Medina at the center. Flowers circle the image and a calendar for the year 1941 is in the lower section of the poster.

inscription.text: For your services please always remember
Delhi Calendar Mfg. Co. Kashmere Gate, Delhi.
हमारे यहां उम्दा कैलेन्डर - क्रिसमस , दिवाली और ईद कार्ड, ब्लौटर्स और छपे हुये फीते वगैरह २ तैयार होते हैं।
यह हमारे कैलेन्डर का एक रंग के विज्ञापन का नमूना है जिसपर १२ महीनों की तारीखें अंगरेजी कैलेन्डर की जमीन पर ही छापी गई हैं। नीचे ऊपर टीन और लटकाने का फीता लगाया जावेगा
Specialist in:- High Class Calendars, Blotters, Tapes, New Year, Christmas, Dewali and I'ds Cards Manufacturers, Advertisers & Field Creators for New Novelties.
(...) not readable due to faulty scanning. (gs)
For Prices please see our Clause No. 8 of the Price List.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: Shrine of the Prophet at Medina, in a 1941 calender advertisement of Delhi Calender Mfg.Co., Delhi.
